credible__info.message: The $1 is most likely to be accurate, according to strong signals we found

mostly_credible__info.message: The $1 is likely to be accurate, but may contain some minor inaccuracies, according to the (strong) signals we found

credibility_uncertain__info.message: The $1 probably mixes some accurate and inaccurate (or not verifiable) claims

mostly_not_credible__info.message: The $1 is most likely inaccurate, according to strong signals we found

not_credible__info.message: The $1 is most likely inaccurate, according to strong signals we found

not_verifiable__info.message: The $1 does not contain verifiable claims (it's all opinions or speculations), or we could not find sufficient signals supporting/refuting the claims in the $1

not_tagged__info.message: The $1 has not yet been tagged by the system

inaccurate_with_considerations__info.message: The $1 mixes accurate and inaccurate subcontent

provide_claim.message: If you think this is not accurate please provide a claim and a link to a post that supports that claim

provide_claim_text1.message: Based on your ratings, we may suggest ways to improve media literacy

provide_claim_text2.message: You can help us by telling us whether you think the $1 is accurate or not and include a link to a source providing evidence

provide_claim_untagged.message: If you want you can provide a claim and a link to a post that supports that claim

provide_claim_with_login.message: If you think this is not accurate you can provide a claim by logging in with your Co-Inform user

login_register_instructions.message: Click on the Co-Inform logo on the top right corner of your browser to open the login/register popup

invalid_url.message: The url introduced is not valid

provide_url.message: Please provide a link to your claim

mail_not_valid.message: The text introduced is not a valid email

password_not_valid_info.message: Check again the passwords introduced. The minimum length is 6 characters, and the 2 password inputs must coincide

mail_password_not_found.message: User mail not found or wrong password

register_problem.message: Something went wrong during the registration. Try again

register_ok.message: User succesfully registered. Now you can log in

register_not_valid.message: Register not valid. Check your data again
